text:
@aztaclalz You completely took me in the wrong tone. I did not mean that in the sense of "Why would anyone care" so much as just simply curious. The way you phrased it, you seemed less like simply wanting to share an opinion and more like you were upset from the get go, so I was curious.
The way you are typing is throwing me off, full of contradiction, one minute practically insulting me by telling me I'm full of it/ hypocrite, the next calling be buddy and being pals and back again.
author: Arc13

text: @aztaclalz Wait, WHAT? When did I write shit? And how am I being a hypocrite for asking a question? What are you even talking about????
author: Arc13

text: @aztaclalz Erm, OK, entitled to your opinion but I must ask why did you feel the need to tell that?

author: tttc

text: The memorable 7th dungeon from LA. Having to go through all the different floors while carrying that big ball so you can take down the pillars on each level. To be honest, I consider this one of the best dungeons in the whole Zelda series. Not only that but while I've always considered this my favorite 2D Zelda, it might even be my favorite one overall.
author: SupraDarky
